haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Lambrecht Steinberg
Obltn Patrik Schorner
Ltn Kurt Wintgens
Fw Dietrich Holweck

 The mission was flown from Bonneuil Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 26/06/1916 near Chavignon.
A F.E.2b of Esc 105 was brought down by Uwe Schneider of Jasta 4.
S/Lt Luc Eschenbrenner was killed in action.
S/Lt Richard Brindejonc was killed in action.
Uwe Schneider was  flying a Fokker E.III.
